entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:19 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 12:35 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
